description: .1 and .2  inside of each is divided into four sections; each has plexi case which is open on one side; off-white with cushioned fabric on lid; .1a,b  strawberry basket on lid; brown vines on sides; gilt trim, yellow yarn trim at lid corners; .2a,b  pink carnations on lid; green leaves and blue flowers on sides; gilt trim; green yarn trim on lid corners
dimension: H.2-1/2 x W.3-3/4 x D.2-1/2 in. (each, overall)
title: Pair of Boxes
